nodes.text: The species of Ravna was a sentient species of vampiric creatures that could infect others and transform them into similar creatures.

This batlike species could turn other beings into similar creatures through scratching them. Force-sensitives like Count Dooku could resist the transformation for a time. They and the creatures they spawned were also able to absorb different types of energy from their mouths, including those from blaster bolts and lightsabers.
